name: Gelatina - Ubuntu Package Dowloader
short_description: Gelatina UPD, is a package dowloader for Ubuntu like synaptic (for this moment is like apt-get :P). download dependencies and check for downloaded packages in your Ubuntu system. (actualy work like apt-get in windows and ubuntu)
